item.title: Active
item.description: Active Jude Sire: Flash Dam Sire: Candy Cane Jude was the alpha male from Flash and Judy’s clutch, hatched 10/17/17. He has strong yellows and a fierce attitude! 1 year Body shot D s c00373

item.title: Retired
item.description:
Retired Kako Sire: Sparkles Dam Sire: Leo Kako was a very striking female with a shy personality. She was taken by a hawk from our garden fence… Kako Kako1
Flash Sire: Cowboy
